author: Ian Cameron
description: Scotch, vermouth, fortified wine and bitters. If there is a Manhattan then this is an Aberdeen, Glasgow and Edinburgh rolled into one.
name: Scotch Point
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth
7.5 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice filled glass
